# llms.txt - AI crawler and LLM usage policy
# Last-Updated: 2026-01-05

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /buscar
Disallow: /privacidad
Disallow: /links
Disallow: /blog/page/1
Disallow: /blog/tag/*/page/1

# Usage policy
# - Indexing: Allowed
# - Training: Allowed
# - Caching: Allowed
# - Rate limits: Follow robots.txt crawl-delay if provided (none specified here)
# - Respect robots.txt directives in addition to this file
